task.summary: Default task

BIG Push, lots of features org logo will display on back of event for easier identification.
added timezone selection as well as ip and JS based.
fixed edit/delete menu to show for creator.
added extra event fields to edit method as well as create.
small changes, made edit / delete dropdown click instead of hover added the mission brief url to view page if exists.
changed up the ip detection to a new more reliable API.
backend cleaning of code to stop duplication of code.
changed date number color so that it can be determined on a day with an event.
changed registration to get all info in one go instead of requiring 2 steps.
Added all contractor orgs to a DB with logo's and RSI links for footer, and cross use on citizenwarfare.
copied terms, and privacy policies from citizenwarfare.
updated to font awesome 5.
added about dev page.
Added HotJar for tracking and feedback! - adjusted code to below js declaration
changed avatar dimension restriction, set size restriction to 1gig
Total overhaul of code, organizations now have there own private calendar, they can share this with other orgs org keep it private, they can also share specific events while keeping others under wraps.
updated font to hopefully allow it to use the zebulon font online, and not just local
minor tweek to organization migration
stopped ignoring org_logos x2
scope issue fixes x4
added google analytics
made calendars private by requiring an account and being logged in.
other QOL changes
Added Public Event ticker to bottom of viewport.
fix for IP issue
update to notifications to make them hang out for a sec
small update to frontend.
added admin section user/visitor tracking
fixed issues with timezone if API dies (use ?timezone={your_timezone_name} )
fixed organization request to show all requests, not just 1 at a time.
Revamp of organization member registration
Normalized HTML, enhanced backend code.
simple typo
fixed reference generation
added template to lost password emails.
Async with ajax for most profile updates.
moved RSS feed updates to background cron job.
testing live push notifications.
updated for x-mas! some discord bot features coming.
Added Discord push to bot ability, next is to put it behind a paywall.

changed registration to get all info in one go instead of requiring 2 steps.
